title: Zscaler: A $100B Company By 2030 (NASDAQ:ZS)
description: Zscaler has a strong portfolio and a differentiated strategy which will sustain its growth momentum. See why ZS stock will become a $100 billion company by 2030.
content: Sundry Photography Cybersecurity Sector Sentiment Shift The cybersecurity sector, has been facing a sentiment shift following the Palo Alto's Q2 earnings report. The company lowered revenue guidance and mentioned a spending fatigue among its clients.... [7133 chars]
